```{r}
# create vectors a and b

vec_a <- c(1, 6)
vec_b <- c(2, 4)

# return them
vec_a
vec_b

# addition
vec_a + vec_b

# subtraction
vec_b - vec_a

# scalar multiplication
2 * vec_a

# dot product
vec_a %*% vec_b
```
